Info

Defines class ProdConfig with attribute(s) and method(s). Production database configuration.

class app_server.configuration.database.prod_config.ProdConfig[source]¶

Bases: BaseConfig

Defines class ProdConfig with attribute(s) and method(s). Production database configuration.

It defines:

attributes:
DB_USER - Database connection username.
DB_PASSWORD - Database connection user password.
DB_HOST - Database server address.
DB_PORT - Database server port.
DB_DIALECT - Database dialect prefix.
SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI - Set DB URI.
methods:
None
DB_DIALECT: str = 'postgresql'¶
DB_HOST: str = '127.0.0.1'¶
DB_LOGIN: str = 'mydbuser:mydbpassword'¶
DB_NAME: str = 'manage_users'¶
DB_PASSWORD: str = 'mydbpassword'¶
DB_PORT: int = 5432¶
DB_SERVER: str = '127.0.0.1:5432'¶
DB_USER: str = 'mydbuser'¶
SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI: str = 'postgresql://127.0.0.1:5432/manage_users'¶
